subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4324 is on the way
description_text:
Good afternoon,

This package has been in Chicago for a week now. Delivery time was 5-7 days
and it's been two weeks. Not sure how to resolve this.

Thank you,
Michael

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Dahl,     This is your tracking number SF6047119768428. The shipping carrier is SF Express, you can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill. We apologize for the logistics delays due to the peak season.
